title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I click on the StylesSWT.MULTI option under the Text tab in the SWT example ControlExample, I hear a windows 'ding' sound (the bell sound that means you did something wrong).
EB: I expect that there should be no sound when I choose the SWT.MULTI option.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on StylesSWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on StylesSWT.MULTI.
